descript: Feature allowing buyers to search, select products, and place orders from sellers on the platform.
manual: Open app > Select "Products" tab > Search keyword > Choose product > Add to cart > Checkout.

descript: Create and manage an internal wallet for quick payments without immediate bank linking.
manual: Log in > Go to "My Wallet" > Tap "Create New Wallet" > Verify phone number > Top up via transfer.

descript: Connect a bank account for secure, automatic payments.
manual: Go to "Settings" > "Payments" > "Link Bank" > Select bank > Enter details > Confirm with OTP.

descript: Save delivery addresses for easy repeat orders.
manual: Go to "Account" > "Addresses" > Tap "+" > Enter full address (house number, ward, district) > Save as default.

descript: View real-time order status from placement to successful delivery.
manual: Go to "My Orders" > Select order > View timeline (Processing > Shipping > Completed).

descript: Upload new products with images, descriptions, prices, and inventory.
manual: Go to "Selling" > "Products" > Tap "Post New" > Upload photos > Enter name, price, description > Publish.

descript: Review and confirm orders from buyers to start processing.
manual: Go to "Orders" > Select new order > Tap "Accept" > Update estimated delivery time > Notify buyer.

descript: Update order status (shipping, cancel, refund) during processing.
manual: Go to "Orders" > Select order > Choose action (Ship > Complete) > Add notes > Save.

descript: Manage all orders: processing, completed, or canceled.
manual: Go to "Selling" > "Orders" > Filter by status (New/Preparing/Shipping) > View details.

descript: View revenue reports, profits, and sales stats by day/month.
manual: Go to "Reports" > "Revenue" > Select time range > View charts and totals.

descript: Update real-time GPS location while delivering to buyer.
manual: Open app > Select "Delivery Orders" > Tap "Start Delivery" > Allow location sharing > Update on arrival.

descript: View and accept assigned delivery orders from the system.
manual: Go to "My Orders" > Select available order > Tap "Accept" > Confirm estimated time.

descript: Confirm successful delivery and receive shipping fee.
manual: Go to active order > Tap "Delivery Complete" > Take photo confirmation (optional) > Receive fee notification.

descript: Update personal info like profile picture, name, phone number.
manual: Go to "Account" > "Profile" > Edit info > Upload new photo > Save changes.

descript: Send chat messages between buyer-seller-shipper for order discussions.
manual: Go to order > Tap "Chat" > Type message > Send (supports photos and attachments).

descript: Browse and search products from all sellers on the platform.
manual: Open "Home" tab > Use search bar > Filter by category/price > View product details.

descript: Create new account or log in to access features.
manual: Open app > Tap "Login" > Choose email/phone/Facebook > Verify > Complete.

descript: Manage and view push notifications for orders, promotions, updates.
manual: Go to "Notifications" > Read new alerts > Enable/disable types in settings.

descript: Rate and review products or services after completion.
manual: Go to "Orders" > Select completed order > Tap "Rate" > Select stars and write comment > Submit.

descript: View FAQ or contact support via chat/email for general issues.
manual: Go to "Help" > Select topic (Account/Orders) > Submit question > Track response.
